problem.p:
A block of mass m is moving on a smooth table when it collides elastically with a second block of mass 2m. This second block then strikes a massless spring with a spring constant k, which compresses an amount d before the block comes to rest.
Find the original velocity at which the first block was moving using the other variables in the problem.
